amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to Congress continuing its work to rein in the administrative state by supporting legislation that prevents Federal agencies from finalizing major rules without congressional approval, strengthens the Article 1 law-making powers of Congress, cuts spending resulting from costly regulations, reduces inflation, and unleashes economic growth.

vote.text: Amendment SA 922 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 85.
